Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to agreements regarding automatic license plate reader systems
Summary: Prevents owners or operators of automatic license plate reader systems from requiring that police agencies meet a minimum threshold of violations or arrests as part of a lease agreement or as part of an agreement to allow the police agency to utilize the automatic license plate reader system.
LawCode: Add ยง397-b, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to agreements regarding automatic license plate reader systems
